comprehensive_overview: The Variant Effect Predictor (VEP) determines the functional consequences of genetic variants. It annotates and predicts the effects of variants such as amino acid changes, regulatory region disruptions, and protein-truncating variants on genes, transcripts, and protein sequences.
core_features:
1. Annotation of genetic variants
2. Prediction of variant consequences on genes, transcripts, and proteins
3. Identification of regulatory region disruptions
4. Assessment of protein-truncating variants
